document.full_text: bob bradley, the coach of the united states national team, is probably thinking long and hard about getting the only two uncapped players on his roster into saturday night's match against argentina. if not then, then certainly tuesday's game against paraguay.
document.title: for u.s., double, triple deutsch
lines_and_colors: bob bradley, the coach of the united states national team, is probably thinking long and hard about getting the only two uncapped players on his roster into saturday night's match against argentina. if not then, then certainly tuesday's game against paraguay.
